doc: An set of heart metrics measured by a withings scale
name: heart

fields.name: stamp
fields.doc: A unix timestamp indicating the time at which the measurement was taken

fields.name: withingsId
fields.doc: The withings user account id associated with the collected metrics

fields.name: macaddress
fields.doc: The macaddress of the withings scale

fields.name: model
fields.doc: The withings model id for the device checking in

fields.name: heartRate
fields.doc: The measured heart rate using electrical pulses send through the foot
